name: SpotColorKind
shortdesc: Custom color kind of the spot color.

property.name: SPOTCMYK
property.shortdesc: Solid ink, expressed in four CMYK values.

property.name: SPOTRGB
property.shortdesc: Solid color, expressed as three RGB values.

property.name: SPOTLAB
property.shortdesc: Lab color. Only valid for spot colors.
